sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './ProfileCard.css'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ProfileCard = ({ location }) => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.authReducer.authData) console.log(user) const posts = useSelector((state) => state.postReducer.posts) const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER return (
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.worksAt ? user.worksAt : "Write about yourself"}
{user.following.length} Following
{user.followers.length} Followers
{location === 'profilePage' && ( <>
{posts.filter((post) => post.userId === user._id).length} Posts
)}
{location === 'profilePage' ? '' : My profile }
) } export default ProfileCard
